title: New: Young Romance – Swollen Hearts, Bitten Tongues
body:
I can’t think of a better way of salvaging the depressing inevitability that is a Monday than with a lovely, synth tinged MPfree.

Interwoven through hollowed percussion and fuzzy guitars lies a sense of whimsy, which is beautifully impassioned by **Claire Heywood**‘s soft yet directed vocals. This is most certainly a track for all those who are twenty-something, currently loved up (or lovelorn), and who enjoy dancing to a good bit of upbeat, infectious melancholy.
